name: Me name is Roger Harper and I spent all me money on lotto tikits
name_original: Me name is Roger Harper and I spent all me money on lotto tikits
description:
"Me name is Roger Harper  and I lost all me money on lotto tikits": A  Bri'ish social realism maid cafe' visual novel docudrama.

Our team documents the life of Roger Harper, a former world renowned cricketer who now slums the city of NEWCASTLE in search of CHEESE-COINS(trademarked crypto) to fuel his addiction to LOTTO-TICKETS. 

"A shocking insight into the realities of life in modern day Britain." - The Guardian

Sponsored by Marlboro.

Made by Team No Name Only Game for Portsmouth Gamejam
